title: Lily Allen looks downcast as she makes a rare appearance without David Harbour in NYC
text:
Her relationship with actor David Harbour has been going from strength to strength with the pair making a number of appearances together in recent weeks.

But Lily Allen, 34, looked downcast as she stepped out alone with her arms crossed in downtown Manhattan on Wednesday.

The British singer, who has said she's staying in America until after Brexit, appeared glum as she went for a walk wrapped up in a black winter coat.

Out and about: Lily Allen, 34, looked downcast as she stepped out in downtown Manhattan on Wednesday while wrapped up warm in a black winter coat and blue jeans

Lily paired her coat with blue jeans and platform black suede boots and added a pair of oversized sunglasses to complete her look.

The Smile songstress tied half of her dark locks up into a ponytail for the trip out and slung a black handbag, which she has been seen using before, over her body.

She also flashed her impressive nail art, which she yesterday revealed had gained her three compliments while riding the subway.

Head down: The singer appeared glum as she ventured out in the city and accessorised her relaxed outfit with a pair of oversized sunglasses and a black bag

The London-based star had previously said she was going to stay with David in America until October 31 when the UK was due to leave the EU, although that date has now been pushed back by three months.

She told her social media followers: 'Leaving UK till after Brexit. Good Luck Kids. Also what's the most annoying engagement baiting question caption you've read? LMK in the comments'.

Lily's romance with David appears to be getting serious and the pair have made a number of public appearances together over the past few weeks.

Chic: Lily added height to her frame by donning a pair of platform black boots on Wednesday

He has also met Lily's children Marnie, six, and Ethel, seven, after they flew out to visit her during their half term break.

The actor shared a sweet snap of the pair dressed up during their visit to Disneyland alongside the Smile singer's daughters.

The actor, best known for playing Jim Hopper in hit Neflix show Stranger Things, dressed as the Beast from Beauty And The Beast, showing off his playful side.

Smitten: Lily's romance with David appears to be getting serious and the pair have made a number of public appearances together over the past few weeks. They are pictured watching the New York Knicks v New Orleans Pelicans game at Madison Square Garden last week

Funky: The Smile singer has been fitting in perfectly in America, revealing she had received not one, but three compliments on her trendy nail art while riding the subway

He posted: 'The prince, princess and the parking lot. That seven dwarves mine ride is the best one in the whole damn park. Go on, fight me. #magic #disney #rulebreakers'.

Lily's little girls - who she shares with her ex-husband Sam Cooper - also enjoyed a road trip to Space Center Houston in Texas with Lily and David.

The mother-of-two uploaded some sweet snaps as she spent some quality time with her daughters over the weekend.

Theme park trip: Last Tuesday, Lily shared snaps to Instagram from a trip to Disney World in Florida with her daughters Ethel, eight, and Marnie, six, whom she shares with ex Sam Cooper

Beauty And The Beast: Stranger Things actor David shared a sweet snap of the pair dressed up during their visit to Disneyland alongside Lily's daughters

Lily separated from ex-husband Sam in 2015 after about four years marriage, finalising their divorce in 2018.

They share joint custody of their two daughters Ethel, seven, and Marnie, six, and remain 'really friendly' to this day.

During an interview on Loose Women back in 2018, she said: '[Our custody agreement] wasn't really something we discussed, we're both really friendly, our kids go to school equidistant between our houses, so it works.'

While David is believed to have split from Fantastic Beasts star Alison Sudol earlier this year after a year and a half of dating.
description: Lily Allen, 34, looked downcast as she stepped out alone with her arms crossed in downtown Manhattan on Wednesday. The singer wrapped up warm in a black coat and donned sunglasses.
